title: Apple Music Classical Now Available on CarPlay
content:
Apple Music Classical was updated today with CarPlay support, allowing users to access the app from their vehicle's infotainment screen when an iPhone is connected.


Apple Music Classical first launched in March 2023, offering users with a standard Apple Music subscription access to over five million classical music tracks at no additional cost. The streaming app features advanced search functionality, exclusive artwork, extensive metadata, curated listening recommendations, and more.

The app is available on the iPhone, iPad, Android, and now CarPlay. It is built upon Primephonic, a classical music streaming service acquired by Apple in 2021.

Apple Music Classical version 1.2 is available on the App Store.
